name: Gitbugs
tagline: GitBugs is a service that help teams understand their GitHub bugs.
body: GitBugs ======= **GitBugs** is a library to help teams understand their GitHub bugs: [http://www.gitbugs.com](http://www.gitbugs.com) Use GitBugs.download(user, repo, status) to download bugs for a given repositiory. "status" can take the values "open" or "close". Try the following example to get started: ``` Download Bootstrap Bugs ``` License ======= MIT license - [http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php](http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php)
